conbody.p: There is also a visual tool, HDFview, that can be used by a user who prefers to work with a grachic interface. While the command-line utilities are distributed with the HDF5 library, HDFview is distributed separately:.

HDVFview is an excellent choice when a user wishes to browse a file and can be used to extract raw data from the file. It is not scriptable, however, which may become time consuming when working with many different datasets or files.
